GET /api.description: provides a JSON object with all the available endpoints for the api

GET /api/topics.description: provides an array of all the available topics in the api

GET /api/articles.description: provides an array of all the available articles in the api

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: it returns an array of comments for the article with the given id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: allows the user to pass through an object specifying how they would like to amend the votes tally on the article with the given id, it returns the updated article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/.description: takes an object with a username and body, posts the comment and returns the comment as an object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with the provided comment id, it does not return anything
